text: Birendra Bir Bikram Shah Dev () (28 December 1945 â€“ 1 June 2001) was the king of Nepal from 1972 until 2001. He was the eldest son of King Mahendra. He was a king of Nepal until his death by assassination in 2001 Nepalese royal massacre. title: Birendra of Nepal
